title: On the Emperor's Lap
description:
A heartbreaking, fantasy romance of the two wounded souls finding their way back to each other again. 
"He abandoned me as a child, and I lost my voice. When I was reunited with him I was already broken."  

Little Bella, a war orphan who once trusted for survival; grows up carrying an abandonment wound. It’s a life without purpose, she’s the unseen, unheard, and a war slave.
Kiris embraces Bella, a girl he once abandoned, now has been forgotten. Maybe it is too late when he’d found her again. 
 
Will she get over past hurts and believe in love again, when there is too much damage done?

(Source: NetComics)

[url=https://www.netcomics.com/comic/179]Official English 2[/url]
[url=https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/emperorslap]Official English 3[/url]
Based on the Original Webnovel by USOI
